chapters.title: Chapter 10: The Use of Dragons
chapters.info: Captain Trom, p. 232—Stocky Whitecloak who allegedly uncovered the “Darkfriends” that were hanged in Morgase's presence. He has been recently promoted, to Captain, due to his experience fighting the Seanchan. He sided with Galad against Eamon Valda, and has since been made Galad's second-in-command of the Children.
